name: BB Carom Billiard
description:
# Top Paid App in board game category in 2012
# 2nd Top Paid App in Korea (2012)

BBright’s first work, BB Carom, is a billiard game created by billiards lovers.
We have tried to combine a ​game with real billiards world, and it worked well. Please, enjoy with your friends and compete with other gamers in the world through the Game Center.



[ Features ]

- Incredibly easy control
- Feels like playing the real billiards
- 3 Cushion 3 Ball / 4 Ball two game modes
- Competition with gamers around the world through the Game Center
- iPod / iPhone / iPad Universal App



[ Report & Technical Support ]

- BBrightDev@gmail.com
- http://www.facebook.com/BBrightDev

We appreciate your reviews and e-mails. Your comments make the better BB Carom.
